mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ac_resource ( id, parentId, resourceType, resourceName, resourcePath, createBy, createDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{resourceType}, #{resourceName}, #{resourcePath}, #{createBy}, #{createDate} )

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO ac_resource ( id, parentId, resourceType, resourceName, resourcePath, createBy, createDate ) VALUES ( #{item.id}, #{item.parentId}, #{item.resourceType}, #{item.resourceName}, #{item.resourcePath}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createDate} );

mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS id, p.resourceType AS resourceType, p.resourceName AS resourceName, p.resourcePath AS resourcePath, c.parentId AS c_parentId, c.id AS c_id, c.resourceType AS c_resourceType, c.resourceName AS c_resourceName, c.resourcePath AS c_resourcePath FROM ac_resource p LEFT JOIN ac_resource c ON p.id = c.parentId WHERE p.resourceType = #{resourceType} AND p.parentId = 0
